archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.3.12: Sensitive information stored on office equipment should be securely destroyed (e.g. by using deletion software or physically destroying the hard disk drives) before the equipment is decommissioned, sold or transferred to an external party (e.g. a leasing company or equivalent).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
